experience.title: Experience & quality

about.quote: Every product is a story, created by loving hands
about.text: I'm Eglė — I've been knitting since I was 18 and I create unique handmade products in my studio in Veiviržėnai. Every piece is made from natural materials, with love and special attention to detail.

hero.title: Handmade products
hero.subtitle: I create unique knitted, crocheted, and sewn products, each with special attention to detail

descriptions.autumnScarf: A soft knitted scarf made from high-quality merino wool, perfect for warmth and completing any outfit. Each piece is hand-knitted with special attention to pattern and color combinations.
descriptions.bowTie: An elegant handmade bow tie — the perfect accent for formal or festive occasions. Can be ordered in any color.
descriptions.summerShawl: A lightweight summer shawl knitted from a fine merino wool and silk blend. Ideal for draping and elegant occasions.
descriptions.winterMittens: Warm winter mittens knitted from natural wool with subtle traditional patterns. Perfectly warming even on the coldest winter mornings.
descriptions.laceTablecloth: A lace tablecloth crafted using traditional lacework techniques with subtle botanical motifs. Creates a cozy and elegant atmosphere in any home.
descriptions.linenNapkins: Handmade napkins sewn from high-quality natural linen. Durable, eco-friendly, and long-lasting — a perfect choice for everyday use.
descriptions.wovenBasket: A woven basket made from natural materials, suitable for storing small items or gifts. Each basket is unique — the weaving pattern varies slightly.
descriptions.candleCozy: A knitted candle cozy creates a warm and cozy glow in your home. Protects surfaces from heat and decorates your interior.
descriptions.babyCardigan: A soft baby cardigan made from 100% merino wool — gentle and hypoallergenic. Every detail — buttons, seams — is finished with special care.
descriptions.knittedDress: An elegant knitted dress suitable for both everyday wear and special occasions. Knitted from high-quality natural wool — stylish and long-lasting.
descriptions.knitSweater: A classic knitted sweater made from a soft merino wool and cashmere blend. Pairs beautifully with any outfit style and keeps you warm all winter.
descriptions.linenBlouse: Light linen blouse sewn from high-quality natural linen — breathable and comfortable. The perfect summer garment to wear with skirts or trousers.
descriptions.crochetHooksSet: A high-quality crochet hooks set with various size hooks, suitable for beginners and experienced crafters alike. Stored in a soft case — easy to carry.
descriptions.yarnBundle: A bundle of soft natural merino wool yarn in various colors for crafting. High-quality material suitable for sweaters, scarves, and other handmade projects.
descriptions.fabricScissors: Professional sewing scissors with sharp stainless steel blades — ideal for precise fabric cutting. Ergonomic handle and long-lasting quality.
descriptions.stitchMarkers: Colorful stitch markers help you track your progress in complex patterns and keep your count. Set includes various sizes for different yarn weights.

care.bowTie: Hand wash or machine wash on delicate cycle 30°C.
care.summerShawl: Hand wash 30°C. Dry on a flat surface.
care.wovenBasket: Clean with a damp cloth. Do not tumble dry.
care.babyCardigan: Hand wash 30°C. Dry on a flat surface.
care.knittedDress: Hand wash 30°C. Dry flat. Iron through damp cloth.
care.knitSweater: Hand wash 30°C. Dry flat. Do not wring.
care.crochetHooksSet: Clean with a damp cloth. Store in a dry place.
care.fabricScissors: Clean with a dry cloth. Oil blades periodically.

hero.quote: Every stitch I make is with love — so my creations warm not just the body, but the soul
hero.intro: I'm Eglė Žemgulienė — I knit, sew, and create unique handmade products in my studio in Veiviržėnai, Klaipėda district, Lithuania.

story.label: My story
story.text:
I first picked up knitting needles when I was eighteen. Since then, they've become an inseparable part of my life. Over more than fifteen years, I've created not only in Lithuania but also in Norway — where I spent several years perfecting my craft and learning from the Scandinavian knitting tradition.

But I always wanted more. In 2020–2021, I learned the fundamentals of sewing at Dygsnis courses, and from 2021 to 2023, I completed a professional seamstress qualification at the Klaipėda Technology Training Centre. In 2023, I participated in an international seamstress craftsmanship competition and won first place. It was a confirmation that I was on the right path.

create.label: What I create
create.text:
Today I create everything — from cozy knitted scarves and baby clothes to elegant evening dresses and home interior details. Every product is unique because each one is born from an individual vision — whether my own or a client's.

I accept custom orders. Do you have a dream of a special dress, shawl, or tablecloth? Let's talk — together we'll find the best solution.

natural.title: Natural materials
natural.text: I work only with natural fiber yarns and high-quality fabrics — so that every product is gentle on the skin and kind to the environment

quality.title: Highest quality
quality.text: I use tools from world-renowned manufacturers — Lykke, ChiaoGoo, Bernina — because only the best tools allow you to create the best products

longevity.title: Longevity
longevity.text: For me it's not just about beauty but also durability — so that every creation serves you well and brings joy every day

cta.text: Do you have questions or want a custom order?
